titles.title: Foreclosure Mandatory Mediation Act of 2009
A bill to require lenders of loans with Federal guarantees or Federal insurance to consent to mandatory mediation.
Foreclosure Mandatory Mediation Act of 2009

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: Foreclosure Mandatory Mediation Act of 2009 - Amends the Helping Families Save Their Homes Act of 2009 to require the mortgagee of certain one- to four-family residences, as a prerequisite to a foreclosure proceeding or a sheriff sale, and at the mortgagee's expense, to conduct a one-time mediation with the affected mortgagor and a housing counseling agency.
